item.title: [DELTA] Adding Skillcape Emotes and gfx
item.description:
@202685 wrote:

how bout this for my first tut
adding skillcape emotes and gfx

this is client and server sided
download the models here:
http://uppit.com/ycqoksm1lhnt/SkillCape_Rip.zip

put these in you models folder.

now for (CLIENT SIDED)
go to class23.java
look up “404”
without the quotes
you will see stuff like

if(j == 643){ // Veng Other aClass23Array403[j].anInt405 = 1828;// Model aClass23Array403[j].anInt406 = 4417; // animation aClass23Array403[j].aClass20_407 = Class20.aClass20Array351[aClass23Array403[j].anInt406];// Update }

but most important. under
setGFXBase(j);
add this under it

[code]if(j == 614){ //str
aClass23Array403[j].anInt405 = 18963;// Model
aClass23Array403[j].anInt406 = 4982; // animation
aClass23Array403[j].aClass20_407 = Class20.aClass20Array351[aClass23Array403[j].anInt406];// Update
}
if(j == 613){ //wc
aClass23Array403[j].anInt405 = 19092;// Model
aClass23Array403[j].anInt406 = 4958; // animation
aClass23Array403[j].aClass20_407 = Class20.aClass20Array351[aClass23Array403[j].anInt406];// Update
}
if(j == 599){ //magic
aClass23Array403[j].anInt405 = 19083;// Model
aClass23Array403[j].anInt406 = 4940; // animation
aClass23Array403[j].aClass20_407 = Class20.aClass20Array351[aClass23Array403[j].anInt406];// Update
}
if(j == 710){ //Hp
aClass23Array403[j].anInt405 = 18961;// Model
aClass23Array403[j].anInt406 = 4972; // animation

}
if(j == 612){ //Hp

}

}

if(j == 615){ //firemaking

aClass23Array403[j].aClass20_407 = Class20.aClass20Array351[aClass23Array403[j].anInt406];// Update
}[/code]

now (SERVER SIDED)
go into client.java
add this under public class client extends Player implements Runnable {

public void SkillCape() { if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 2695 || playerEquipment[playerCape] == 4321) { //fm setAnimation(4975); lowGFX(615, 0); } else if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 2728 || playerEquipment[playerCape] == 4335) { //fish setAnimation(4951); lowGFX(616, 0); } else if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 2686 || playerEquipment[playerCape] == 4351) { //range setAnimation(4973); lowGFX(617, 0); } else if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 2731 || playerEquipment[playerCape] == 4325) { //cook setAnimation(4955); lowGFX(618, 0); } else if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 2716 || playerEquipment[playerCape] == 4337) { //fletch setAnimation(4937); lowGFX(619, 0); } else if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 2713 || playerEquipment[playerCape] == 4327) { //CRAFt setAnimation(4949); lowGFX(620, 0); } else if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 2683 || playerEquipment[playerCape] == 4329) { //def setAnimation(4961); lowGFX(621, 0); } else if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 2737 || playerEquipment[playerCape] == 4331) { //farm setAnimation(4963); lowGFX(622, 0); } else if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 2710 || playerEquipment[playerCape] == 4361) { //theif setAnimation(4965); lowGFX(623, 0); } else if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 2719 || playerEquipment[playerCape] == 4355) { //slay setAnimation(4967); lowGFX(624, 0); } else if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 2704 || playerEquipment[playerCape] == 4317) { //agil setAnimation(4977); lowGFX(625, 0); } else if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 2707 || playerEquipment[playerCape] == 4339) { //herb setAnimation(4969); lowGFX(626, 0); } else if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 9783 || playerEquipment[playerCape] == 9784) { //hunt setAnimation(4937); lowGFX(627, 0); } else if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 2742 || playerEquipment[playerCape] == 2743) { //con setAnimation(4953); lowGFX(605, 0); } else if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 2689 || playerEquipment[playerCape] == 4347) { //pray setAnimation(4979); lowGFX(606, 0); } else if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 2698 || playerEquipment[playerCape] == 4333) { //rc setAnimation(4947); lowGFX(607, 0); } else if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 9795 || playerEquipment[playerCape] == 9796) { //quest setAnimation(4943); lowGFX(608, 0); } else if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 2725 || playerEquipment[playerCape] == 4357) { //smith setAnimation(4943); lowGFX(609, 0); } else if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 2722 || playerEquipment[playerCape] == 4345) { //mine setAnimation(4941); lowGFX(610, 0); } else if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 4319 || playerEquipment[playerCape] == 2677) { //att setAnimation(4959); lowGFX(611, 0); } else if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 2734 || playerEquipment[playerCape] == 4353) { //wc setAnimation(4957); lowGFX(613, 0); } else if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 2680 || playerEquipment[playerCape] == 4359) { //str setAnimation(4981); lowGFX(614, 0); } else if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 9813) { setAnimation(4945); lowGFX(816, 0); } else if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 4341) { setAnimation(4971); lowGFX(612, 0); } else if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 2692 || playerEquipment[playerCape] == 4343) { setAnimation(4939); lowGFX(599, 0); } else { sM("You need a skillcape to perform this emote."); } }

now in clickingmost.java or actionbuttons.java
add

case 74077: c.SkillCape(); break;

or if u have an older interface just replace an existing emote with
c.SkillCape

well thats it for my snippet…
